description: First Cabinet Meeting of the New Government Held
article_title: First Cabinet Meeting of the New Government Held
article_body_paragraphs: The first Cabinet meeting of the new government was held today (19) at the Presidential Secretariat under the leadership of President Anura Kumara Dissanayake.
During the meeting, Minister of Health and Mass Media, Dr. Nalinda Jayatissa, was appointed as the Cabinet Spokesperson for the new government.
